releaseNotes: Explore the latest Klarna app. We're bringing you a new and improved shopping experience to search, compare, and save at your favourite stores. Keep track of all your payments, deliveries, and budget with ease. Organise your cards and balances within your in-app Wallet, and customise your journey by configuring preferences in your profile. We've also made some minor updates and fixes.
description:
MANAGE YOUR PAYMENTS.
Get a complete overview of your purchases, upcoming payments, and outstanding balance. Stay on track by activating push notification reminders.

SHOP AT YOUR FAVOURITE BRANDS.
Access Klarna's flexible payment options anywhere, exclusively in the Klarna app. You can Pay now, Pay in 3 interest-free instalments, or Pay in 30 days.
Klarna's Pay in 3 / Pay in 30 days are unregulated credit agreements. Borrowing more than you can afford or paying late may negatively impact your financial status and ability to obtain credit. 18+, UK residents only. Subject to status. Ts&Cs and late fees apply. Visit: klarna.com/uk/terms-and-conditions.

GET THE KLARNA CARD.
Use Klarna everywhere Visa is accepted. Pay right away, once a month or over time, shop abroad without foreign exchange fees from Klarna, and enjoy no monthly fees.
Klarna Card is a regulated credit product. Borrowing more than you can afford, or paying late, may make it harder to get credit. 18+, UK residents only. Subject to status. T&Cs and late fees apply. Representative APR 0.0% (variable).

SEARCH FOR ANY PRODUCT.
Find what you're looking for faster, and compare prices across your favourite stores to get a great deal.

NEW DEALS EVERY DAY.
Shop and save with exclusive deals and discounts from all over the world, right in the Klarna app. Find a deal you like, claim it with a tap, and check back tomorrow—new offers are added all the time.

TRACK YOUR DELIVERIES. 
Get live updates on your purchases and track them from store to door. 

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS. 
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

INSTANT SHOPPING CONFIRMATION.
No one likes to wait. When you buy something in the Klarna app, you'll see your purchase just seconds after you place the order.

STAY SAFE. 
Shopping is thrilling enough without security risks. Our login with Face ID, Touch ID or PIN is as simple as it is secure.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE. 
Use our chat in the Klarna app for round-the-clock service.

BOOK A TRIP. PAY IN 3.
Spread travel costs over time with Klarna. Book flights, hotels and rentals at your favourite sites in the app. Holiday planning just got a bit smarter.

WE’VE GOT YOUR BACK.
Shop with peace of mind knowing that Klarna’s Buyer and Fraud protection has you covered. 

DIGITISE YOUR LOYALTY CARDS
Klarna is the official successor to Stocard. Unclutter your wallet by scanning the code on your plastic cards within seconds.
